text: (upbeat electronic music)

- I'm San Brar, I'm a
Senior Data Architect
located in Vancouver, British Columbia.
So, why Proserve?
If you're gonna go consulting,
there's lots of consulting companies.
Why do you wanna work with us?
It's really the ownership of the problem

that you're taking it on
and you would do anything
to solve that particular problem.
So, whatever it takes, you know.
You going to bring in people
from deep within the AWS service stack,
bring them together to solve this problem.

And that's what you
know, they hire us for,

and that's a huge value
proposition for our customers.
When I tell people I work for Amazon,
sometimes they get scared.
"Oh my goodness, you work for Amazon.
That must be, like, crazy."

I'm like, "No, I get
to work on great things

with cool people and I get to
keep my priority number one
my life, my family.
What else can I ask for?"
(upbeat electronic music)
